translation.en: What's up, Grandpa? Where you going?
[gasps] Holy fuck! Who the fuck is that?
-Oh. -Hey, it's me! It's me, it's me.
-What the fuck are you doing here? -It's me.
-[laughs] What? -You scared the shit out of me.
Sorry, sorry, sorry, all right? Don't freak out.
I can't stand it when you do that!
Hey, so when is your dad's birthday again?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 你爸的生日是什么时候？

translation.en: Uh, November 9th.
Cool, cool, okay. Yeah, I got a fun gift idea for him.
translation.zh:
‎酷 太好了
‎我想好要买什么有趣的礼物给他了

translation.en: What? Which one?
Yeah, I'm gonna get him these, like, Omaha Steaks.
-You know... you know about Omaha Steaks? -Oh.
Um, yeah.
Yeah. Like, they put 'em in a box... -Mmm-hmm. -...they send 'em off,
translation.zh: ‎他们把生牛排放进盒子里 直送到家

translation.en: and then you take 'em out of the box and throw 'em on a grill.
translation.zh:
‎然后你把牛排拿出来
‎直接火烤就可以了

translation.en: I'm gonna send your dad, like, a couple dozen.
-I think he'll like it. -Cool.
-I'll just-- -Don't touch my feet.
What? Come on, you know you like that when I touch your feet.
translation.zh: ‎怎么了？别这样 你喜欢我摸你的脚

translation.en: -Come on-- -Don't touch my feet. I just think, it'd be good. [stutters]
translation.zh:
‎-跟你说别摸我的脚
‎-我只是想让你舒服

translation.en: I need you back. I need you to take care of me.
translation.zh: ‎我要你回到我身边 我要你照顾我

translation.en: And... and I was thinking about us...
[stammers] and... about my heart and how I feel about you.
translation.zh: ‎想着我对你的心意和我对你的感觉

translation.en: Come on, I know you. And I love you and you're so hot.
translation.zh: ‎我了解你 我爱你 你真的很性感

translation.en: And I just... I need you, Mama.
Fine. Just shut the fuck up! I'll fuck you, but then you have to go.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 闭嘴就是了！
‎我会跟你上床 但结束后你得离开

translation.en: -You're not sleeping here tonight. -Yeah, that's cool.
translation.zh:
‎-你今晚不能在这里过夜
‎-没问题

translation.en: I was looking at this website... -Mmm-hmm. -...and I found this rug.
translation.zh: ‎我看了这个网站 看到了这块地毯

translation.en: I thought it would look really good in your living room.
Oh, yeah.
Yeah, I like that orange one. It's nice.
translation.zh: ‎对 我喜欢橙色的 很好看

translation.en: I was thinking the blue one.
Sure. Blue works, too.
Yeah, I mean, either/or...
Orange or blue, whatever one you're standing on,
translation.zh: ‎橙色还是蓝色 只要你选的

translation.en: it's gonna look good.
I was thinking about that, um... you know the blue rug.
Maybe we don't get it, like, for my place, but...
translation.zh: ‎或许不用放在我那里 但可以…

translation.en: Like, what if we got it for, like, our place?
You wanna move in together?
-Yeah. -Yeah.
-I mean, do you? Do you-- -Yeah.
-You wanna move in? -Yeah.
-[moans] -Let's move in together.
-Yes! -I am God's warrior!
-Yes, you are! Yes, you are! -[yelling]
I'm gonna come. I'm gonna come.
I'm comin'. I'm comin'.
[Eric] Do you remember that little...
The travel-size Connect Four? Do you remember that game?
translation.zh:
‎旅行用四子棋？
‎你还记得那个游戏吗？

translation.en: What? Why?
I just wanna... I wanna play a game from my youth, you know?
translation.zh:
‎我想要重温小时候的游戏
‎你知道吗？

translation.en: Nobody has the attention span anymore to just sit and play a game.
translation.zh: ‎没有人愿意花时间坐着玩游戏

translation.en: What about Operation? Remember Operation?
translation.zh: ‎外科手术游戏呢？你有印象吗？

translation.en: [mimics electrocution] Ah, shit.
Why can't we just sit anymore?
Maybe that's 'cause you're coked up.
translation.zh: ‎或许因为你把时间用在吸毒上

translation.en: That's not it, all right? Okay, let's--
Nobody can just sit and read a book anymore.
Nobody just sits and reads a book-- All right, you know what? We'll...
translation.zh:
‎没有人可以好好坐着阅读
‎你知道吗？

translation.en: Let's both read books, and we'll see who gets distracted first.
translation.zh: ‎我们来看书 看谁先分心

translation.en: We'll see... we'll see who's gonna do that.
I'm not gonna read with you, Eric.
translation.zh: ‎我才不要跟你一起看书 艾瑞克

translation.en: All right, this is what we'll do.
I'm gonna read Crime and Punishment, all right?
And you'll read Cujo, all right? That's what we'll do.
translation.zh:
‎你看《狂犬库丘》可以吗？
‎我们就这么做

translation.en: And we'll see who can read the most pages without getting distracted.
translation.zh: ‎我们看谁可以不分心看最多页

translation.en: Ready to do that? Let's do that, okay?
translation.zh: ‎好了吗？我们准备开始 可以吧？

translation.en: Cocaine, no cocaine, my attention will not be challenged.
translation.zh:
‎无论有没有可卡因
‎我的注意力都不会被影响

translation.en: You got a real drug problem, Eric.
What's that?
Well, these are the drugs I have to take to deal with you.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 我的药 为了可以应付你

translation.en: All right, ready? No distractions, all right?
Just read. No distractions. No.
We just get right into it. We just get...
Just right into it. We're just gonna get right into it, all right?
-Ow! [laughs] Ow, God. -Ow! [groans]
-Fuck... ow. -Didn't know your knee was there.
translation.zh:
‎-该死的
‎-我不知道那是你的膝盖

translation.en: -Are you okay? -Yeah, I'm okay.
Okay.
Hey, I love you. Okay?
What's the matter? What's wrong?
You say "I love you" too much.
-Do I? -Yeah.
Okay. Well, I'm, like, so sorry to be affectionate to you.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 我为我太多的爱向你说抱歉

translation.en: -I guess that's-- -No, it's not affection, it's pressure.
translation.zh: ‎不 那不是爱 那是一种压力

translation.en: Because then if I don't say it back then it becomes a thing.
translation.zh: ‎因为假如我不回应就好像是我的错

translation.en: Well, why wouldn't you say it back?
translation.zh: ‎那你为什么不对我说我爱你？

translation.en: I mean, if it's true you would say it, right?
translation.zh:
‎假如你对我也是有感觉的
‎你就会说出口 不是吗？

translation.en: 'Cause I, like, I love you.
translation.zh: ‎因为我的感觉就是 我爱你

translation.en: Oh, my God, please stop saying that.
translation.zh: ‎噢 天啊 拜托你不要再说了

translation.en: -Okay, well, I do. I love you-- -Okay, stop it!
translation.zh:
‎-嗯 我是认真的 我爱你…
‎-够了 停！

translation.en: -I love you. -Stop it.
-What is the fucking problem? -Gus, please shut up!
translation.zh:
‎-到底有什么问题？
‎-天啊 拜托你闭嘴！

translation.en: I love you. God damn it! What is the matter?
translation.zh: ‎我爱你 该死的！到底怎么回事？

translation.en: -[groans] -What? Just fucking say it.
I fucked another guy! [sighs]
Well, you know, just so you know, like...
because we're broken up, that means, like, we're not talking anymore, you know?
translation.zh:
‎因为我们分手了
‎所以我们不要再联络了 知道吗？

translation.en: So you can, like, text, and you can call and, like, email me,
translation.zh:
‎你可以传信息 打电话
‎或发电子邮件给我

translation.en: but I'm not, like, gonna reply, okay?
translation.zh: ‎但是我不会回复你 好吗？

translation.en: -So, like, once you're out, you're out. -So we're never gonna talk again?
translation.zh:
‎-一旦你出局了 就是结束了
‎-所以我们不会再联络了？

translation.en: No, because you fucked another guy, okay?
translation.zh: ‎对 因为你劈腿 懂吗？

translation.en: I can't imagine that... that you're just gonna be around and you're not gonna be in my life.
translation.zh:
‎我无法想象一直在我身边的你
‎这个时候却要离开我

translation.en: I mean, like...
obviously, we're still gonna be friends, okay?
translation.zh: ‎我们还可以是朋友 好吗？

translation.en: -[screaming] No! -What the fuck?
This is what I'm fucking talking about!
Well, what am I?
Am I too nice? Am I too mean?
Yes, you're too fucking-- You're not nice!
You're... you're fucking fake nice, which is worse than being mean!
translation.zh: ‎你超级做作 这比心肠坏还糟糕！

translation.en: You know, it's over. I get that.
translation.zh: ‎好了 都结束了 我知道了

translation.en: It's fucking over and it's done.
translation.zh: ‎一切都他妈的结束了 玩完了

translation.en: [sighs] I just want you to be true to yourself.
Okay, being true to myself?
-Yeah. -I want you to fucking die.
Okay? I want you to fucking get a disease and die,
or fucking get in a car accident and die.
That's what I want, I want you to fucking die.
translation.zh: ‎这就是我希望的 我要你去死

translation.en: It's over.
-[car horn honking] -Oh, shit.
-What? What's wrong? -[sighs] We just gotta go quicker.
translation.zh:
‎-怎么了？哪里不对吗？
‎-我们要快一点

translation.en: -Why? What the fuck? -[moaning]
-My mom's here. -What the fuck?
-Why is your mom here? -Oh, just go quicker.
translation.zh:
‎-你妈为什么会来？
‎-快一点就对了

translation.en: -Come with me, come with me. -No, I can't. I can't just do that.
-You're like-- -[grunting]
What the fuck, dude? That's really lame.
translation.zh: ‎你他妈的搞什么？真的很扫兴

translation.en: Oh. Well, I just...
I got stuff to do today, you know? Gettin' it together.
translation.zh: ‎我今天有事 得准备一下

translation.en: You're really going right now?
What? Yeah. Yeah, she's taking me to buy pants and I totally forgot.
translation.zh:
‎什么？她要带我去买裤子
‎我差点忘了这件事

translation.en: What the fuck?
-You can't but your own pants? -She offered.
translation.zh:
‎-你不能自己买裤子吗？
‎-她送我的

translation.en: It's not cute that you live with your parents, Eric.
translation.zh:
‎到现在还和父母住一起
‎这很丢脸 艾瑞克

translation.en: You tell people it's some sort of life hack, but it's just sad.
translation.zh:
‎你跟别人说这只是一种生活小技巧
‎但这很可悲

translation.en: It's sad to want new pants?
All right, I'm sorry, I'm a human being, all right?
translation.zh: ‎好吧 抱歉 我只是平凡人 好吗？

translation.en: Eventually, I'm gonna need pants.
[scoffs] Wait, you're going? You're actually going? Eric!
translation.zh:
‎等一下 你真的要走？
‎你真的确定要走？艾瑞克！

translation.en: I don't even know why it's something you get pissed off about.
translation.zh: ‎我根本不知道你到底在气什么

translation.en: -I need new pants. What's wrong with you? -Eric, fucking, you wait!
translation.zh:
‎-我只是想要一件新裤子 有错吗？
‎-艾瑞克 等一下！

translation.en: Don't get in that car. You were just fucking me--
translation.zh: ‎别上车 我们才刚办完事…

translation.en: [Mrs. Todd] Good morning, Mickey.
Hi, Mrs. Todd.
Hey, me and Eric are going to that new mall in Topanga.
translation.zh:
‎嘿 我和艾瑞克正要去
‎托潘加的新购物中心

translation.en: Don't get in the fucking car, dude.
translation.zh: ‎我叫你别上该死的车 老兄

translation.en: I'm so tired of you acting like a fucking child.
If you get in that car with your mom, then you're a fucking loser.
translation.zh:
‎假如你上了你妈的车
‎你就是个屌丝

translation.en: Snore, snore, snore.
You're putting me to sleep, Ma. You're boring me to death right now, okay?
translation.zh:
‎你的碎嘴让我想睡 老妈子
‎你让我感到无聊至极 好吗？

translation.en: You think I'm a fucking child? You think I'm a fucking loser?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得我是小孩子？是个屌丝？

translation.en: Well, bullshit, all right? You're just as fucked up as me.
translation.zh:
‎听你在鬼扯 好吗？
‎你跟我没什么两样

translation.en: The difference is I have the balls to admit it.
Ma, let's go!
Eric, honey. Honey... why don't you invite your friend Mickey
translation.zh:
‎艾瑞克 亲爱的
‎你不问你的朋友米琪

translation.en: and we will go and get the slacks at the mall together?
translation.zh:
‎要不要和我们一起去购物中心
‎买裤子吗？

translation.en: He's not my friend. His cum is still inside of me.
translation.zh: ‎他才不是我的朋友 我们才刚办完事

translation.en: Eric, it's over!
[Eric] Who even talks to somebody's mother like that?
translation.zh: ‎谁会跟别人的妈妈这样讲话？

translation.en: I'm open.
-Got you. -[girl chuckles]
[narrator on TV] Retaining a harem of over 100 females
will require him to fight many challengers... [thud]
[boy] Hey, um... a little help?
[narrator on TV] Elephant seal pups in such a hostile environment
can sometimes get caught in the middle of these riots,
putting them in harm's way.
-Oh... Hey. -[boy] Hey, sorry about that, man.
[Gus] Oh, sorry?
Who cares, guys? It's fine.
Have fun, you know?
Here you go. Oop, sorry.
Cool.
So you guys are up... [sighs] early, huh? You on spring break or...
translation.zh: ‎你们怎么这么早起？放春假还是…

translation.en: -Oh, this is study abroad. -In Los Angeles, huh?
The college, they put us up at the Springwood for a semester.
translation.zh: ‎学校安排我们在春木这边一个学期

translation.en: Yeah, since this shithole is basically, like, one step up from a dorm room.
translation.zh:
‎对啊 因为这个鬼地方
‎比宿舍稍微好一点

translation.en: Yeah, I'm gonna miss all the drug dealers
and child actors and the sad divorced guys.
Well, I'll let you get back to your Fris-ing.
translation.zh: ‎好 就不打扰你们的玩乐

translation.en: Well, hey, man, we're having a kickback tonight by the pool.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 我们今晚在泳池有个放松派对

translation.en: You should drop by.
Yeah. Yeah, maybe. We'll see, we'll see.
translation.zh: ‎好啊 或许吧 再看看

translation.en: [Mickey] So that's the bathroom, we have to share it.
-[woman] Oh, okay. -My mom gave me that stupid thing.
-It's nice. Uh-huh. -Um, that's the kitchen.
-Do you cook? -Uh, a little here and there.
-Baking... -Huh?
You never really hear about an Australian style of cuisine.
translation.zh: ‎你从来没听说过什么澳洲名菜吧

translation.en: No, there isn't any.
-[cat meows] -Hmm. [gasps] No, bad, bad.
-Aw. Who's the kitty? -Ugh, sorry about that.
Oh, God. Are you allergic to cats?
translation.zh: ‎噢 天啊 你不会对猫过敏吧？

translation.en: No, no, no, I love cats. What's his name?
translation.zh: ‎不 我很喜欢猫 他叫什么名字？

translation.en: His name's Grandpa.
I named him that 'cause he's a reincarnation of my grandpa.
translation.zh:
‎会叫这个名字是因为
‎他是我爷爷转世投胎的

translation.en: -Cute. -So what do you think?
Of your, uh... Oh, here?
[stutters] Yeah. It's good, I like it.
So you wanna move in?
Um... oh, really?
Yeah, I mean, you don't seem crazy
and I don't feel like meeting with a ton of people. So?
translation.zh: ‎而我不想要带一大堆人看房 如何？

translation.en: Wow, okay. Great.
Great. I'll text that other girl and tell her to not to come over.
translation.zh:
‎好的 那我就通知另一个女孩
‎不用来看了

translation.en: You snooze, you lose.
translation.zh: ‎只要你打个瞌睡 可就没机会了

translation.en: Cool. So were you, like, living with another roommate, or...
translation.zh: ‎所以你之前有室友 还是…

translation.en: I mean, my boyfriend kind of lived here with me.
It was sort of on and off. He'd come and go.
translation.zh: ‎我们之间时好时坏 他来来去去的

translation.en: He'd mainly live with his parents, but... then we broke up, so whatever. [scoffs]
translation.zh:
‎他和父母一起住
‎但我们分手了 就这样

translation.en: Oh, um, I'm so sorry.
Don't be. I'm so glad we broke up...
translation.zh: ‎不要这么说 我很高兴我们分手

translation.en: I just don't really wanna live alone, you know?
translation.zh: ‎我只是很不想要一个人住 你懂吧？

translation.en: Well, that's perfect. We can hang out.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 那很好 我们可以一起玩

translation.en: And we will.
I just wanna really clearly establish the roommate boundaries initially.
translation.zh:
‎但我还是得说清楚室友间
‎还是得保有一些界线

translation.en: [stuttering] Yeah. Yeah.
That actually sounds like we've got a lot in common.
translation.zh: ‎听起来我们应该会很合得来

translation.en: Well... [smacks lips]
get out of my space! [chuckles]
This is gonna be fun.
But, Mother, why is the wolf following me?
translation.zh: ‎但妈妈 为什么狼会跟着我？

translation.en: Do not fear him. He is your protector.
translation.zh: ‎不要害怕他 他是你的守护者

translation.en: Now that you're becoming a woman, your powers are growing.
translation.zh:
‎现在你要成为女人了
‎你的力量会越来越强大

translation.en: My powers? Am I becoming a witch?
We will know soon enough.
When your body aligns with the lunar cycle.
translation.zh: ‎你的身体将随着月亮周期变化

translation.en: Now, command the wolf.
-[inhales sharply] -Sabien, submit.
He's not even looking at me.
Uh, cut!
All right, let's get the wolf to sit. How about that? What's the problem?
translation.zh:
‎我们让狼先休息一下
‎好吗？什么问题？

translation.en: Arya, you have to make your hand a fist or the wolf won't sit.
translation.zh: ‎阿雅 你得先握拳不然他不会坐下

translation.en: I was.
No, actually, you were just holding your hand up.
Are you blind or something?
I was doing exactly what you said to. The dog's just stupid.
translation.zh: ‎我完全照着你做 是那只狗太笨

translation.en: God, just check the playback, I was doing it.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 你去看回放 我有这么做

translation.en: Arya, superstar, what up?
[groaning] I'm so tired!
-Evan. -Hey, what's up, man?
Hey, man. What's going on?
Not much. What do you need?
-Tutor time. -Seriously? You're doing this now?
translation.zh:
‎-家教时间
‎-认真的？你说现在吗？

translation.en: Dude, have you been paying attention? We lose the wolf in half an hour.
translation.zh:
‎你刚有在看吗？
‎我们已经花了半小时在狼身上

translation.en: No, I get it. I just... you know...
Arya needs her three hours of class...
-every day. -Right.
I'm dealing with a child actor and a live animal here.
translation.zh:
‎我得面对一个小童星
‎和一只活生生的狼

translation.en: I-- I just need you to be a team player.
I know. But I feel like it's always
animals that are coming in and push, you know...
translation.zh:
‎我知道 但我总觉得 ‎一直都是动物的问题
‎今天是蛇 明天又是…

translation.en: One day it's snakes, the next day it's--
translation.zh:
‎一直都是动物的问题
‎今天是蛇 明天又是…

translation.en: Dude, have you ever worked on a supernatural period piece before?
translation.zh: ‎你有参与过超自然力量的制作吗？

translation.en: Come on, man. Everyday there's a serpent or there's a mule.
translation.zh: ‎别这样 每天都是蛇或是骡子之类的

translation.en: I'm looking out for Arya here, okay?
translation.zh: ‎我只是在照顾阿雅 好吗？

translation.en: I don't know what to tell you, man. They're witches, they deal with animals.
translation.zh:
‎我真不知道要怎么说
‎她们扮演女巫 就是得和动物相处

translation.en: Evan, she needs three hours of class every day, okay?
translation.zh:
‎艾文 她每天需要上3小时的课
‎懂吗？

translation.en: So we're doing this.
Seriously? That's the tone you're gonna take?
translation.zh: ‎你认真的？你要像这样跟我讲话？

translation.en: Yeah, come on, man. It's the law.
translation.zh: ‎对 是啊 这是法律的规定

translation.en: -It's called working-- -What's going on?
-Is there an issue? -Susan, hey.
Uh, no issues.
Lovin' the scene, it's so good.
Guys, this wolf is almost out the door.
-Can we handle this some other time? -[Evan] Yes.
Right, but it's just--
If Arya's not in class
and somebody reports this, we could lose our jobs and--
translation.zh:
‎阿雅没去上课
‎我们可能会失去工作…

translation.en: [scoffs] Dude, you are the only one that cares about--
But we could. We could lose our jobs!
Hey, hey, hey. Why are we going crazy here?
Gus, listen.
I respect your passion and commitment here.
translation.zh: ‎我尊重你的工作热情和使命感

translation.en: -Thank you. Thank you. -[Susan] You know?
Yeah, and, you know, and if the wolf goes away before we get this shot, you know, that's... that's fine.
translation.zh: ‎假如狼在拍摄完成前跑了 没关系啊

translation.en: You know, we'll... we'll work it out.
That means so much. I appreciate that. Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎这意义重大 我很感激你 谢谢

translation.en: What would that mean, Evan?
I'm guessing we just have to come in on Saturday to finish?
translation.zh: ‎我想我们得在这周六加班完成？

translation.en: Uh-huh. Yeah.
Yeah, just come in over the weekend.
-Yep. Mmm-hmm. -Mmm.
The crew will probably not like that much.
[Evan] Oh, they're gonna be pissed.
I mean, I guess you don't give a fuck about
translation.zh: ‎我想对于花时间在小孩身上

translation.en: people spending time with their kids. Oh, wait, you don't have kids.
translation.zh:
‎你应该没什么意见 等一下
‎你没有小孩

translation.en: -[Evan] That's for sure. -Uh...
I feel like we're wasting time by arguing about it, so...
translation.zh:
‎我觉得我们浪费太多时间在争吵
‎所以…

translation.en: [inhales] Let's just do it.
-Really? Excellent. -[Gus] We'll do it. Mmm-hmm.
You're my soldier.
All right, we got another take, everybody. Second take.
translation.zh:
‎我们再拍一个镜头
‎各位 第二次拍

translation.en: Uh, why does everyone else get a CGI wolf? Why the fuck do we have a real wolf here?
translation.zh:
‎为什么其他人可以用后制合成狼？
‎为什么我们要用真的？

translation.en: Arya, hey. False alarm.
It's gonna be about 50 more minutes. And then, we'll take it to class.
translation.zh: ‎再拍50分钟 然后我们就去上课

translation.en: I can't. I need a nap.
[clicks tongue] Nope. No naps today.
-I've been here since 6:00. -I know that.
But how you gonna count all that money you got if, uh, you don't know math, right?
translation.zh:
‎假如不上数学课你就没无法
‎正确算出你赚了多少钱 对吧？

translation.en: Um, Jeff, the accountant?
translation.zh: ‎可以找杰夫 那个会计师？

translation.en: Right, Jeff.
He's an Orthodox Jew, I think he knows what he's doing.
translation.zh:
‎他是正统的犹太人
‎我想他可以做得很好

translation.en: [man on radio] Our next caller is Jason from Chicago.
translation.zh: ‎下一位是来自芝加哥的杰森

translation.en: Jason, how we doin'? How's our day going?
translation.zh: ‎杰森 在做什么呢？今天好吗？

translation.en: [Jason] Well, my mom passed away.
Oh. My condolences.
I have to say, I'm not too torn up about it,
translation.zh:
‎-请节哀
‎-我想说的是 ‎我没有很伤心

translation.en: and actually, that's what's kind of got me upset.
translation.zh: ‎其实 这就是我为什么烦心

translation.en: The fact that I'm not upset.
We can't control how we feel.
And sometimes... [inhales]
these archetypical people in our lives, they hurt us.
translation.zh:
‎出现在人生里的原型人格
‎会伤害我们

translation.en: And they don't fulfill the archetype.
translation.zh: ‎而原型人格和平常的人不完全一样

translation.en: What... what's an archetype?
An archetype is a...
Well, I don't really have the exact definition.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 我无法切确说出它的定义

translation.en: I do know what it means, obviously, because I just used it. Um...
translation.zh: ‎但我知道它的意思 我刚刚用了 ‎收尾

translation.en: Well, thank you so much for calling.
I am Dr. Greg Coulter
and you are listening to the Love and Living Channel
translation.zh: ‎你现在收听的是G重力卫星电台的

translation.en: on Gravity Satellite Radio.
You listen, we hear.
Great. Great show, Greg.
translation.zh: ‎很好 很好的节目 葛雷格

translation.en: [Dr. Greg] Oh, thanks so much, Rob.
-I really appreciate it. -So good.
-Good morning, Mickey. -Hey, you said you wanted to talk?
translation.zh:
‎-早安 米琪
‎-你说想要聊聊？

translation.en: Yeah.
We need to fire Rob. Rob's gotta go. Does that make me evil?
translation.zh:
‎我们得开除罗伯 罗伯得走
‎我这样很坏吗？

translation.en: No! Please. This is a business.
You know what?
Can you fire him for me... huh?
-Or do program managers not do that? -[sighs]
translation.zh: ‎还是说节目经理不做这种事？

translation.en: What? I mean, okay, you know what? I'll do it.
If you do it, Rob will think I'm a coward.
translation.zh: ‎假如你去 罗伯会觉得我是胆小鬼

translation.en: Yeah, I think that's probably the right move.
No, wait, you know what? You do it.
I'm sorry, I'll stop being annoying.
translation.zh: ‎不好意思 我会停止这么烦人

translation.en: So what's the problem? What did he do?
translation.zh: ‎所以到底是什么问题？他做错什么？

translation.en: Look... Rob does a great job...
but the guy creeps me out.
He's got this look in his eyes. You ever meet a person
translation.zh:
‎他总是这样看着我
‎难道你没遇过像他这样

translation.en: and they smile, and you feel like they're screaming at you?
translation.zh:
‎对着你笑 但你会觉得
‎像是在对你大叫的人？

translation.en: What? Rob?
Rob's like the nicest guy in the whole world.
translation.zh: ‎罗伯是这世界上心眼最好的人

translation.en: He's nicer than both of us.
Well, he's just got this bad energy, this aura around him.
translation.zh:
‎嗯 他只是有股负面能量
‎一直在他附近

translation.en: Has he ever done anything to you?
He asked me do I like him.
That's weird, right? That's not a thing you ask anybody.
translation.zh:
‎这不是很奇怪吗？
‎这不是一般人会问的问题

translation.en: -Let alone in a workplace. -[sighs]
Look... I would fire him but I can't take that on right now.
translation.zh:
‎听着 我会开除他
‎但不是立刻这么做

translation.en: This might be a difficult thing for you to understand
translation.zh: ‎这对你来说 可能有点难理解

translation.en: but I am very vulnerable in this job.
translation.zh: ‎但我做这份工作时很容易被影响

translation.en: I have to be.
I make myself vulnerable to the world.
I can't be vulnerable around somebody like Rob.
So he's gotta go.
Fine, I'll do it just to end this conversation.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 我会这么做
‎我们结束这个话题吧

translation.en: I'm a pussy, aren't I?
I'm sorry, I'm disgusting.
Okay, you know what? I'll do it.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 你知道吗？我会处理

translation.en: -[whispers] Thank you. -Oh, question.
What is a good band to work out to? Something new.
translation.zh:
‎有什么好的新乐团吗？
‎来点有新意的

translation.en: [exhales] I don't know. The Monkees?
That's great. [chuckles]
Thanks, you're the best. You know what?
translation.zh: ‎谢啦 你人真好 知道吗？

translation.en: You fire Rob.
[woman] So how was the move out of the Springwood?
translation.zh: ‎亚历山大亮点餐厅 ‎搬离春木的事怎么样？

translation.en: Uh, you know, it's funny it didn't end up actually happening.
translation.zh: ‎有趣的是 最后这件事没发生

translation.en: He finally realizes that the Springwood rules.
You love it there, right?
No. I mean... not exactly.
translation.zh: ‎不 我是说…也不完全喜欢

translation.en: You can live anywhere in LA!
translation.zh: ‎你可以住在洛杉矶任何地方！

translation.en: Okay, like, where?
I mean... [stutters] I've been looking, but it's just...
I'm having a hard time finding a place I like.
You can move near me. The Eastside.
translation.zh: ‎你可以过来我那附近 东边

translation.en: I don't know. It's just a little too cool. And now...
translation.zh:
‎我不知道 那里有点太酷了
‎而且现在…

translation.en: I'd be like the Beverly Hills guy with, like, a white Corvette.
translation.zh:
‎我想住在比弗利山庄那边
‎开一辆白色科尔维特跑车

translation.en: [clears throat] I mean, is that what we're doing?
[stammers] We're just playing what we'd wanna be?
I don't think it's, like, what I want to be. It's, like, who I am.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得不是说想要成为的样子
‎而是说我是谁

translation.en: Like, who am I?
I mean, like, where do guys like me live, you know?
Where do the, like, repressed hostile nerds
whose girlfriend's accuse them of being "fake nice" live?
translation.zh: ‎又被女友认为很“做作”的怪人住？

translation.en: -Santa Monica? -No.
As long as I stay in the Springwood, you know...
maybe I get a text from Natalie saying, "Let's try it again."
translation.zh:
‎我可能会收到娜塔莉的短信
‎写着：“让我们再试试”

translation.en: And I can just bop out of the Springwood back to another place
translation.zh: ‎这样就可以离开春木到别处去

translation.en: instead of like, bop Springwood, bop new place, bop Natalie.
translation.zh:
‎而不是从春木到新的地方
‎从新的地方再到娜塔莉住处

translation.en: It's crazy, right?
Please don't tell me you think you and Natalie are gonna get back together.
translation.zh: ‎别跟我说你想要跟娜塔莉复合

translation.en: -'Cause that's never gonna happen. -Yeah.
You're saying it... like, it's over?
She cheated on you. Why would you wanna be with her?
translation.zh: ‎她劈腿 你怎么还会想要复合？

translation.en: Gus, she sucked, man.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 她糟透了 老兄

translation.en: [woman] Fuck Natalie. And fuck the Springwood.
translation.zh: ‎去他的娜塔莉 他妈的春木

translation.en: I think you'll find someone better.
translation.zh: ‎我相信你可以找到更好的人

translation.en: [stammers] You know, I know you'll find someone better
translation.zh: ‎真的 我也相信有更好的人

translation.en: and if you have trouble, I can set you up.
translation.zh: ‎假如你真的有困难 我可以帮你

translation.en: She wasn't right for you, dude.
I think I gotta go.
Gus. Wait. We gotta...
translation.zh: ‎格斯 等一下 我们得…

translation.en: [sighs] We gotta pay.
Otis, put the dirt down now!
I suppose it's better than Heather's kid. -She eats dog shit. -[snorts]
translation.zh:
‎我想他已经比海瑟的小孩好多了
‎她连狗屎都吃

translation.en: [laughs] I'm serious.
Oh, my God, this day is dragging.
translation.zh: ‎噢 天啊 一天真是漫长

translation.en: You know what my favorite part of the day is?
translation.zh: ‎你知道一天中我最喜欢什么时候？

translation.en: [sighs] Taking my Ambien.
-Really? -Yeah.
There's this moment right after it kicks in,
and I'm still awake and everything is perfect.
translation.zh: ‎醒来后还是觉得一切很美好

translation.en: Seriously, I look forward to 9:30 every day.
translation.zh:
‎老实说 我很期待
‎每天早上的9点30分

translation.en: I don't like that shit.
I always wake up having made spaghetti.
[chuckling] Spaghetti is the best. What's wrong with that?
translation.zh:
‎意大利面很好啊
‎意大利面哪里惹你了？

translation.en: You want some Ambien?
No, thanks. [sighs]
Are you sober?
Kinda.
I get it.
Fuck it! Give me some Ambien. Give me a whole handful.
translation.zh: ‎天啊！给我来一点 给我一大把好了

translation.en: [inhales sharply] All right.
I'm sure you have your own methods... but I turn off all electronic devices.
translation.zh:
‎我想你知道怎么做对你最好
‎我的话会关掉所有的电子产品

translation.en: The last time I took an Ambien, I emailed my high school principal
translation.zh: ‎上次我吃了药后发邮件给高中校长

translation.en: to tell him what a great job he had done.
translation.zh: ‎跟他说我觉得他做得好极了

translation.en: [chuckles softly] That's why you're my favorite neighbor.
translation.zh: ‎这就是为什么你是我最喜爱的邻居

translation.en: Otis, enough with the dirt.
You have reached your quota.
Down.
You know, I guess she used to be an extra on The Little Rascals.
translation.zh: ‎我想她曾经是《小淘气》的其中一个

translation.en: For real?
-Yeah, no, she told me that. -[man] Jeez.
translation.zh:
‎-对啊 她自己跟我说的
‎-天啊

translation.en: -Hey, what's going on? -Hey.
What's happening here?
This old lady in E-2021 died.
I guess she fell in the shower
and the water kept running on her body for, like, a week,
translation.zh:
‎然后水不断地从她身上流过
‎流了一星期

translation.en: so when they found her, the bathtub was full of mush.
translation.zh:
‎当他们发现她时
‎浴缸的水浓稠得不象话

translation.en: Jesus! [softly] What... What?
I told you not to give details.
translation.zh: ‎我告诉过你不要说得那么仔细

translation.en: Yeah, well, you're the one who gave me the details.
She lived here for 42 years, man.
-[whispers] Wow. -[softly] Yeah.
How long have you guys lived here? Eighteen years.
They're roommates but they're not gay.
translation.zh: ‎他们是室友 不是同志伴侣

translation.en: Yeah, Chris, I don't care. That's fine.
translation.zh: ‎克里斯 我不在乎 没关系

translation.en: Why, did you think we were gay?
We're best friends. This is my BFF. We're roomies.
translation.zh:
‎我们是最好的朋友
‎这是我最好的朋友 我们是室友

translation.en: Yeah, no, he said... I didn't.
translation.zh: ‎不 是他说的 我没有

translation.en: I don't even care. It's fine.
translation.zh: ‎我一点都不在乎 没关系

translation.en: Nice to meet you.
-Yep. -Take it easy.
Later, dudes.
Hey, we're not gonna wind up like those two guys, are we?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 我们以后不会像那一对老人吧？

translation.en: I hope so.
We should be so fucking lucky.
Thirty years of friendship?
We should be so fucking lucky, Gus.
translation.zh: ‎我们最好也能这么幸运 格斯

translation.en: Fuck it.
[sighs heavily] Shit.
translation.zh:
‎对不起 原谅我 聊聊吧 ‎该死 ‎今晚威尔顿3294号
‎幸福之家见？我想你 米琪

translation.en: You know what I love about Uber?
You don't have to tip.
Fuck taxis, man. Uber's changing the world.
translation.zh: ‎出租车去死吧 优步改变了世界

translation.en: And you own this car, right?
translation.zh: ‎而这辆车还是你的 不是吗？

translation.en: It's, like, a nice car.
-Yes, ma'am. -[cell phone chimes]
[softly] Oh, shit! Oh, fuck! Shit!
translation.zh: ‎葛雷格博士-搞定罗伯了？ ‎天啊！去你的！该死！

translation.en: [Rob on phone] Hello, this is Rob.
Hi, this is Mickey Dobbs, the program manager from work.
translation.zh:
‎嗨 我是米琪多布斯
‎电台的节目经理

translation.en: Uh, anyway, you know that. [chuckles]
Um, I didn't...
Uh, I don't wanna do this over voicemail, but, um...
translation.zh: ‎我不想用语音留言做这件事 不过…

translation.en: Hello?
Hello? Is this...
is this one of those trick voicemail things?
Mickey, is that you?
God! Sorry! Your voice doesn't normally sound so message-y.
translation.zh:
‎天啊！抱歉！平常你的声音
‎听起来一点也不像语音留言

translation.en: [chuckles] No, it's me.
We're gonna put Frozen on in one second, honey, I promise.
translation.zh:
‎我们先暂停《冰雪奇缘》一下
‎亲爱的 保证马上好

translation.en: Is everything okay?
Um... I don't know how to say this, uh...
I'm just gonna... I'm just gonna come right out
and say it to you, 'cause I respect you, okay, Rob?
translation.zh: ‎我很尊敬你 好吗 罗伯？

translation.en: You are fired from, you know, work.
translation.zh: ‎你被开除了 我是说你的工作

translation.en: [scoffs] What?
Greg told you to fire me?
Yeah. Aw.
But... it's nothing personal.
Sure, it's not personal.
You're just Dr. Greg's little henchman, that's all.
translation.zh: ‎你只不过是葛雷格博士的走狗

translation.en: Oh, come on, man. Aren't we all henchmen?
translation.zh: ‎拜托 我们不都是走狗吗？

translation.en: "Aren't we all henchmen?" What the fuck does that mean?
translation.zh:
‎“我们不都是走狗吗？”
‎该死的 你这是什么意思？

translation.en: Are you high right now?
Are you on drugs?
-Drugs? -[car horns honking]
Oh, so you're firing me over the phone while you drive on drugs?
translation.zh:
‎所以你打电话来开除我
‎而且你还一边在嗑药？

translation.en: That's great. Why don't you show my daughter that?
Tell my six-year-old daughter that. Go ahead.
Hey, look, I drew a big star.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 你看 我画了一颗大星星

translation.en: Oh, she drew a big star... [whispering] you fucking cock-whore!
translation.zh: ‎她画了一颗大星星 你这个婊子！

translation.en: Whoa, dude, uncalled for! Shit!
translation.zh: ‎噢 老兄 干嘛这样！去你的！

translation.en: [Eric] Mickey.
-What the fuck are you wearing? -Aw.
I'm glad you made it.
This is a really weird bar.
It's not a bar. You haven't heard of Bliss House?
translation.zh: ‎这里不是酒吧 你没听过幸福之家？

translation.en: No. What is this, like, a...
translation.zh: ‎没有 那是什么 像是…

translation.en: like, a club for old people?
It's a church. Well, they say it's... like a church for all churches, you know.
translation.zh:
‎是教堂 他们说…
‎像是所有信仰都能来的教堂

translation.en: It's more about oneness and togetherness, not so much a higher being.
But I'm... I'm trying to say I'm sorry, all right?
This is... this is how I'm trying to say I'm sorry to you.
translation.zh: ‎而这是我想要补偿你的方式

translation.en: The midnight service is the best one.
-You're gonna love it. -Fuck, no.
Dude, no, no, I can't do that.
I'm wearing, like, a one-piece under jeans.
Hey! Our buddy from the balcony!
Hey, what's up? You guys! All right. There you are.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 你好吗？大家！你们都在这

translation.en: You dropped by. You even brought your work backpack.
translation.zh: ‎你来了 你还背了工作包来

translation.en: I'm Gus, by the way.
translation.zh: ‎我是格斯 自我介绍一下

translation.en: -I'm Nate. Good to meet you. -Hello. Hi.
-Hey, I'm Hailey. -Did you get a drink yet, man?
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 我是海莉
‎-拿饮料了吗？

translation.en: Uh, you know what?
Yeah. Give me a beer.
-Give you a-- -[Gus] Yeah, give me a beer. Cool.
translation.zh:
‎-来吧…
‎-嗯 来杯啤酒 谢啦

translation.en: Yeah, all right. Okay.
-Beer. [chuckles] -Thank you. Thanks.
-Cheers. -Yeah.
Good evening, blessed specimens of this lifetime.
translation.zh: ‎各位晚安 被祝福的人们

translation.en: How are you all feeling? I wanna hear you.
translation.zh:
‎你们现在觉得如何？
‎我想听听你们怎么说

translation.en: Tonight, we stand together
in a vibratory field of an advancing potential,
the foundation of which is love.
translation.zh: ‎因此我们有着一股前进的动力

translation.en: Love doesn't just happen, we have to choose it.
translation.zh:
‎爱不会突然出现
‎我们得选择相信它的存在

translation.en: We are in a phase of evolution where we have to agree with love.
translation.zh:
‎我们正在进化的道路上
‎所以我们要接受爱

translation.en: We are in a phase of evolution where we have to embrace love.
translation.zh:
‎我们正在进化的道路上
‎所以我们要拥抱爱

translation.en: We have to see love, feel love, touch love, heal love.
translation.zh:
‎我们要看到爱 感受爱
‎触摸爱 治愈爱

translation.en: From the very core of our inner sanction.
Right? You guys know what I'm talking about.
-Come on, let me hear you. -[applause]
translation.zh: ‎来吧 让我听听你们的声音

translation.en: Holy fuck.
You guys are doing it right. Seriously.
All of you guys, this is, like, what your twenties should be about.
Having fun, going wild.
Ever since I was a little kid, I've been acting like a grown-up.
translation.zh: ‎从我小时候开始 我就一直装大人

translation.en: And now, it's like, I'm in my thirties,
translation.zh: ‎到了现在 我已经30几岁了

translation.en: and I'm, like...
"Oh, my God!"
I need to make up for lost time.
Hey, let's get fucking crazy tonight!
translation.zh: ‎嘿 就让我们今晚疯狂一下吧！

translation.en: Will you shut the fuck up?
translation.zh: ‎你们他妈的可以安静一点吗？

translation.en: This is a family community.
Families live here. This isn't fucking Club Med!
translation.zh: ‎有家庭住在这里 这里不是夜总会！

translation.en: Hey! Uh, why don't you just, uh,
let us enjoy this one special moment in our lives...
before we, you know, fucking slip in a shower and turn to mush?
translation.zh:
‎在你还没有在浴室摔倒
‎满身腐烂之前？

translation.en: Go fuck yourself, man!
-I love you guys! -[cheering]
I love this place!
Guys, thank you so much.
So fun. Really--
-You're the man, Gus. -[Gus] You guys are...
translation.zh:
‎-你真是好人 格斯
‎-你们也是

translation.en: -All right, we'll see you tomorrow. -See you tomorrow.
Hey, what are you doing now?
Me? Um, sawing some logs. [chuckles]
What... What does... What does that mean? I don't know what that means.
It means sleeping. It's like an old expression for sleeping.
translation.zh: ‎睡觉的意思 是老掉牙的说法

translation.en: -Oh. [chuckles] -Well, uh--
We still have a couple of hours to kill. Do you wanna hang out at your place?
translation.zh:
‎我们还想要消磨一些时间
‎我们可以去你的地方吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Well, okay. It's a little messy, if that's cool.
translation.zh:
‎嗯 好啊 可以
‎假如你们不介意有点乱的话

translation.en: [Hailey] Oh, God, it's fine.
Oh, my God! Your bedroom is literally identical to ours.
translation.zh: ‎噢 老天！你的房间跟我们的好像

translation.en: -No way. Really? [chuckles] -Yeah. It's so lame, right?
translation.zh:
‎-不会吧 真的？
‎-没错 很逊 是吧？

translation.en: Hey, look at these candles!
-They've never even been lit. -[Hailey laughs] So lame.
It's crazy they have all the same stuff in every...
translation.zh: ‎真夸张 这里每个房间都一样

translation.en: -Yeah. -I know.
-It's nuts. -It's, uh... They're like clones.
-They're clones of each other. -[sighs] -[girl] Clones. -[chuckles]
I'm gonna miss it though.
It sucks that we have to leave and fly back.
-[Gus] Uh... -We wanna move to LA after college.
translation.zh: ‎我们毕业后 想搬到洛杉矶

translation.en: -Ooh. -Oh, really?
-Yeah. [chuckles] -Oh, that's cool.
Yeah, 'cause we never did anything fun while we were here.
translation.zh: ‎因为我们从没在这做过有趣的事情

translation.en: We had all these, like, wild, crazy plans.
translation.zh: ‎我们想过一些疯狂有趣的计划

translation.en: -[laughs] -Oh, really? Like what?
You guys wanted to go to Six Flags or something, right?
-[girl] No. -[all laugh]
No, like, um... [clicks tongue]
I don't know, uh... [sighs]
-Never mind. -[both chuckle]
-You guys are-- -We, uh...
We... we kinda...
-[chuckles] -We wanted to have a three-way.
Oh. Oh, okay.
Yeah.
-Yeah. [chuckles] Uh, have-- -Yeah.
Have you ever had one?
Uh, no. [smacks lips]
-Mmm. Okay. -I... I don't think I have. No.
translation.zh:
‎-好
‎-我想我没有玩过 没有

translation.en: -No, haven't had a three-way. -[all chuckles]
Well, um, I know Reese hasn't...
-No? Right. [chuckles] -...and I haven't, and, uh...
-And I-- Yeah, I haven't. Yeah. no. -And... you haven't.
translation.zh:
‎-而我也没有 对
‎-你也没有

translation.en: So, yeah.
Um, so, is... is it happening?
Now, is this it? This is the three-way? Yeah?
-Yes, Gus. -Okay.
I think that was clear.
Cool.
Children, please, step inside our vibratory field of energy and love
translation.zh:
‎孩子们 请和我们一起走进
‎充满能量与爱的领域

translation.en: and receive our message.
Remember, if you ask the world for love, you will receive love.
translation.zh:
‎记住 假如你向主请求爱
‎你将会接受到爱

translation.en: All of tonight's newcomers, please rise.
translation.zh: ‎今晚新来的人 请站起来

translation.en: Come on. I know-- I know you're digging this.
translation.zh: ‎来吧 我知道你开始喜欢这个了

translation.en: All right, fuck it. [scoffs]
We speak from our eyes and say, welcome home.
translation.zh:
‎我们眼睛看着她们 对她们说
‎欢迎回家

translation.en: [all] "Welcome home."
-[man] We love you. -[all] "We love you."
We walk in your hearts, and embrace your soul.
translation.zh:
‎我们将靠近你们的心
‎拥抱你们的灵魂

translation.en: [all] "We walk in your hearts, and embrace your soul."
translation.zh:
‎“我们将靠近你们的心
‎拥抱你们的灵魂”

translation.en: Please, welcome our newcomers.
This brings our service to an end.
If you didn't get a chance to donate, the tithing baskets are up front.
translation.zh: ‎假如你还想要捐献 箱子就在前面

translation.en: [Mickey] Can I ask something?
Yes.
Excuse me. Sorry. Excuse me.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 不好意思 借过

translation.en: [man] Speak what's in your heart.
Hi, guys. Sorry, I'm on Ambien, so it's, um...
translation.zh:
‎各位 抱歉 我吃了安眠药
‎所以有点…

translation.en: You said earlier that if you ask for love, the world will send you love back.
translation.zh:
‎你说假如你向主要求爱
‎你就会得到爱

translation.en: But I've been asking and asking,
and I haven't gotten fucking anything.
Hoping and waiting and wishing and wanting love...
translation.zh: ‎我是如此渴切地希望得到爱…

translation.en: Hoping... hoping for love has fucking ruined my life.
translation.zh: ‎但结果是 我的生活乱七八糟

translation.en: And you're right, Eric. I am a fuck-up.
translation.zh:
‎你是对的 艾瑞克
‎我老是搞砸这一切

translation.en: I'm really sorry.
But I refuse to believe
that all those dipshits I went to high school with,
who are married now and putting pictures on Facebook every day
of their kids in little headbands have it all figured out, right?
translation.zh: ‎他们绑着头带的小孩照片 是吗？

translation.en: That's gotta be bullshit.
That can't be the deal. That can't be it.
translation.zh: ‎才不可能这么样美好 不可能

translation.en: I know it's, like, not appropriate to be standing up here in a bathing suit...
translation.zh: ‎我知道我这样穿着泳衣 吃了安眠药

translation.en: but I took an Ambien tonight.
I... I was supposed to go to sleep, but then he called me to come here.
translation.zh:
‎我现在应该是要躺着睡觉
‎但是他把我叫来这里

translation.en: -I'm really sorry. -Okay... okay.
-So sorry. -[whispering] It's okay. Thank you.
So many of you.
I'm sorry, I'm just having so much, uh...
-Yes. -[all chuckle]
[Gus] Uh... ah, okay.
Uh, hey, um, hang on...
I'm gonna put on a condom, all right?
I'm... I'm gonna put on a condom real quick, okay? [sighs]
-Excuse me. Sorry, pardon me. -Okay. [chuckles]
So, uh, you know, you two can, uh, kiss each other if you want, you know.
-Nah, that's okay. -No. We don't really want to.
translation.zh:
‎-真的没关系
‎-不 我们不想

translation.en: -You're sure? Really? -[Reese] Yeah.
'Cause otherwise, it's not really, like, a threesome.
It's more like, you know, two adjacent twosomes or... [chuckles]
-Nah. It's not our thing. -No?
Oh, I see, it's sort of, like, um, I'm like the conduit.
translation.zh: ‎我明白了 我要在中间来引导

translation.en: We're sisters.
What the fuck? Jesus! Ew!
I mean, I'm sorry, I don't mean, "Ew," but just, like, what the fuck? Ew!
translation.zh:
‎抱歉 我不是觉得恶心
‎而是怎么回事？好恶心！

translation.en: Relax. What's wrong?
You know, for most guys this would be, like, a fantasy.
translation.zh: ‎对大部份男人来说 这跟做梦一样吧

translation.en: What, to be, like, a participant in incest?
translation.zh: ‎什么 这是乱伦的行为吧？

translation.en: Whoa! [chuckles] Hey.
-This isn't incest, okay? -No.
translation.zh:
‎-这不是乱伦 好吗？
‎-这是啊

translation.en: We've never kissed. We haven't even touched each other.
translation.zh:
‎我们又没有互相亲吻
‎也没有爱抚对方

translation.en: Okay, yeah, but you're, like... [stutters] you know, naked in front of each other.
translation.zh: ‎好 但是你们两个彼此赤裸着

translation.en: That's, like, in the realm of, you know, fucking incest.
So, was it incest when we had baths together as little girls?
translation.zh: ‎那我们小时候一起洗澡也是乱伦吗？

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no. That is, like, worlds apart! Okay?
translation.zh: ‎不 那不能相提并论！好吗？

translation.en: Like, I was touching your boob while I was touching her thigh, okay?
translation.zh:
‎我摸你胸部时
‎我也摸她的大腿 好吗？

translation.en: That's, technically, I'm--
I'm in an incestuous relationship right now, okay?
translation.zh: ‎我在一个乱伦的关系中 好吗？

translation.en: Don't judge us.
I'm not judging you, okay? It's just...
translation.zh: ‎我没有指责你们的意思 好吗？

translation.en: It's a surprise, and in all fairness...
you two should've told me.
Okay, dude. You know what? Sorry that we tried to fuck you.
translation.zh:
‎够了 老兄 你知道吗？
‎很抱歉我们想上你

translation.en: No. I... I didn't mean it-- Uh, it's just...
translation.zh: ‎不 我不是说…我的意思是…

translation.en: I mean, maybe, like, one of you stays?
translation.zh: ‎你们或许可以有一个人留下来？

translation.en: Go fuck yourself.
All right.
That'll be $2.35.
Shit. Fuck, dude, I don't have my wallet.
translation.zh: ‎该死 老兄 我忘记带钱包了

translation.en: Can I pay you back later?
No, we don't do that.
Dude, I live, like, two blocks from here.
translation.zh: ‎老兄 我就住两个街区外而已

translation.en: I'll run home, get money, come back, pay you.
translation.zh: ‎我尽快回家拿钱 再拿来还你

translation.en: I'll pay you more than I owe you. I'll give you a big tip.
translation.zh: ‎我会多付你钱 给你很多小费

translation.en: No. You just go home, get your money,
translation.zh: ‎不行 你还是先回家拿钱

translation.en: then come back and get your coffee.
Dude, I fucking need this coffee right now, please, dude.
translation.zh:
‎我现在真的很需要这咖啡
‎求你了 老兄

translation.en: I need it to, like, you know, get shit going.
Please, please, do me a solid.
This isn't a charity.
If you not gonna pay it, just go. Get out.
[stutters] What, you're just gonna let that coffee get cold?
translation.zh: ‎什么 你就打算把咖啡放凉？

translation.en: You're just gonna waste that cup of coffee?
-Yeah. -That doesn't make any sense.
No, I'm fucking taking this coffee right now.
translation.zh:
‎我不管 我现在
‎就要拿走这杯该死的咖啡

translation.en: No, no, no, no, you stealing the coffee.
I'm calling the police. You're on the cameras.
translation.zh: ‎我要报警了 监视器可都拍到你了

translation.en: -I'm on the cameras? Big fucking deal. -Yeah, yeah. It's--
Hi, hello. Fuck you. Fuck you. I don't care, you have me on the camera.
translation.zh: ‎嗨 去你的 我才不管有没有拍到我

translation.en: You know me, dude. I'm good for it. I'll come right back.
translation.zh:
‎你认识我 老兄
‎我不会消失 等一下就来给钱

translation.en: Hey, you know what? I got this. It's cool.
translation.zh: ‎这样吧 我来付 没关系

translation.en: [cashier] Are you sure?
Yeah. Yeah, I'm sure.
[clicks tongue] Okay.
And a pack of cigarettes?
And a pack of smokes.
Parliaments.
